title: Should You Buy the Dip on PubMatic Stock?
snippet: PubMatic, which operates a supply side platform that helps publishers and app developers monetize their content, grew revenue by 6% in the second quarter to $71.1 million. Net dollar-based retention was 102% for the trailing-12-month period, down year over year but still in expansion territory.

title: PubMatic stock plunges 28% despite strong earnings, hit by DSP partnership concerns
snippet: Shares of PubMatic (NASDAQ:PUBM) dropped 28% in Tuesday's premarket trading, as strong quarterly results were overshadowed by challenges linked to a key demand-side platform (DSP) partner. Management pointed to a major headwind stemming from recent platform changes made by one of its top DSP buyers,

title: Viant: Attractive Price Level With Decent Upside Potential (NASDAQ:DSP)
snippet: Though the stock seems to have gained some momentum YTD with the stock seeing 58% return so far, DSP still has lost over 84% of its value since going public. Today, DSP trades at $10.2.
